title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: When doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference, not on the target type.
EB: When doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Update the behavior so that when doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the unit hosting the import reference instead of the target type.
